src:
What it takes to put on the TCS NYC Marathon

03 Nov 2019, 17:56




NEW YORK CITY -- As you can imagine, it takes a lot of work - and a lot of people - to pull off an event like the TCS New York City Marathon.
More than 12,000 volunteers pitch in to make this a special day.
Michelle Charlesworth has their story.
